description: TOON Implementation Audit Complete: Comprehensive Gemini review identified critical fallback bug in fast_refs/fast_search (returns text instead of structured JSON on TOON failure), missing TOON support in fast_goto (high priority), minor inconsistencies in trace_call_path parameter type, code duplication across 4 tools (120 lines), and 3 advanced optimization opportunities (hierarchical data flattening with parent IDs for 30-50% more savings, string deduplication with @def directives for 20-40% savings, conditional column omission for 10-20% savings). All findings documented in TODO.md with implementation plan across 4 phases. Phase 1 priority: Fix critical fallback bugs that break machine-readable contract with MCP clients.
